settings.name: Choose the Journal that messages will be saved to.
settings.label: Select Journal
settings.pageNameWarning:
If no page is chosen, a new page called Noted Messages will be created.
If the selected page is deleted or renamed, a new page called Noted Messages will be created.

error.journalNotFound: Unable to find your chosen Journal [{journalName}]. It might have been renamed or deleted.
error.noJournalSet: A Journal has not been selected in your configuration.
error.pageMissing: Unable to find [{pageName}] in Journal [{journalName}]. Creating a new page with that name.
error.noPage: Unable to find the correct page in Journal [{journalName}]. Creating a new page called Noted Messages.
